import { GraphQLString } from "gatsby/graphql"

exports.setFieldsOnGraphQLNodeType = ({ type }) => {
  if (type.name !== `File`) {
    return {}
  }

  return {
    newField: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      args: {
        myArgument: {
          type: GraphQLString,
        }
      },
      resolve: (source, fieldArgs) => {
        return `Id of this node is ${source.id}. Field was called with argument: ${fieldArgs.myArgument}`
      }
    }
  }
}

const {

} = require('gatsby/graphql')


const HeadingLevels = new GraphQLEnumType({
  // ä»–ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚‚å«ã‚ã¦ä¸€æ„ãªåå‰ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã‚‹

  name: `LinkHeadingLevels`,

const ParentHeadingType = new GraphQLObjectType({

      resolve: ({id}) => id,
    },
    depth: {

const HeadingType = new GraphQLObjectType({
  name: `MarkdownLinkHeading`,
  fields: {
    value: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.value
      },
    },
    id: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.id

    depth: {

import rehype from 'rehype'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import hastToString from 'hast-util-to-string'

const MIN_HEADER_DEPTH = 1
const HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST = 'element'
const HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST = ['h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6']

function _extractHeadingDetails(htmlStr) {
  // HASTå½¢å¼ã®æŠ½è±¡æ§‹æ–‡æœ¨ã«å¤‰æ›
  const htmlAst = rehype.parse(htmlStr)

  // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°(h1ã€œh6ã‚¿ã‚°)ã‚’æ¢ã™
  const result = []
  visit(htmlAst, HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST, node => {
    if (!HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST.includes(node.tagName)) {
      return
    }

    // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°ã‹ã‚‰æ·±ã•ã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    const heading = {
      depth: Number(node.tagName[1]),
      value: hastToString(node).replace('\n', '')
    }
    // aã‚¿ã‚°ã®ã†ã¡hrefå±æ€§ãŒ#å§‹ã¾ã‚Šã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’æ¢ã—idã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    node.children.filter(c => _isHeaderIdLink(c)).forEach(c => {
      heading.id = decodeURI(c.properties.href.split('#')[1])
    });

    result.push(heading)
  })

  return result
}

function _isHeaderIdLink(node) {
  return node.tagName === 'a'
          && node.properties.href
          && node.properties.href.startsWith('#')
}

exports.onCreateNode = ({ node, actions, getNode }) => {
  const { createNodeField } = actions

  if (node.internal.type !== `MarkdownRemark` && node.internal.type !== `QiitaPost`) {
    return
  }

  // ã“ã“ã§å·®ç•°ã‚’å¸å
  const [
    slug,
    title,
    date,
    excerpt,
    tags,
  ] =
    node.internal.type === `MarkdownRemark`
      ? [
        createFilePath({ node, getNode }),
        node.frontmatter.title,
        node.frontmatter.date,
        _excerptMarkdown(node.rawMarkdownBody, 120),
        node.frontmatter.tags
      ]
      :[
        `/${node.id}/`,
        node.title,
        node.created_at,
        _excerptHtml(node.rendered_body, 120),
        [...(node.tags.map(tag => tag.name) || []), 'Qiita'] // Qiitaã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
      ]

  // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®fieldsã«ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
  createNodeField({ name: `slug`,     node,   value: slug     })
  createNodeField({ name: `title`,    node,   value: title    })
  createNodeField({ name: `date`,     node,   value: date     })
  createNodeField({ name: `excerpt`,  node,   value: excerpt  })
  createNodeField({ name: `tags`,     node,   value: tags     })
}

    • ã¾ãŸã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«ã¯åŒã˜ã‚ˆã†ãªè¡¨ç¾ãŒå¤šãå«ã¾ã‚Œã€WordCloudã®å¯¾è±¡ã«ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºãŒå¤§ããã€å¤§äº‹ãªå˜èªã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å¤–ã®æ–‡ç« ä¸­ã«å‡ºã¦ãã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†å‰æã®ã‚‚ã¨ã€ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ã™ã¹ã¦é™¤å¤–ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™
    • ã€Œæ™‚ã€ã€Œå ´åˆã€ãªã©è¨€ã„å›ã—ã¨ã—ã¦ä½•åº¦ã‚‚å‡ºã¦ãã‚‹å˜èªã¯WordCloudã®æƒ…å ±ã«ã—ã¦ã‚‚æ„å‘³ãŒãªã„ã®ã§é™¤å¤–ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨é•·ã„ã§ã™ãŒã€ ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸­ã®ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã¦è©³ç´°ã‚’èª¬æ˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

/** HTMLå½¢å¼ã®è¨˜äº‹æœ¬æ–‡ã‹ã‚‰HTMLã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ã† */
const striptags = require('striptags')

/** ä»®æƒ³DOM d3.js D3-Cloudã¯DOMãŒã‚ã‚‹å‰æãªã®ã§Node.jså®Ÿè¡Œæ™‚ã§ã‚‚æ­£å¸¸å‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ä»®æƒ³Canvasã‚’ä½¿ã† */
const { createCanvas } = require('canvas')
/** ä»®æƒ³DOM d3.js D3-Cloudã¯DOMãŒã‚ã‚‹å‰æãªã®ã§Node.jså®Ÿè¡Œæ™‚ã§ã‚‚æ­£å¸¸å‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ä»®æƒ³DOMã‚’ä½¿ã† */
const { JSDOM } = require('jsdom')

/** å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã®ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ã† */
const kuromoji = require('kuromoji')

/** WordCloudã®SVGæ–‡å­—åˆ—ä½œæˆç”¨ */
const d3 = require('d3')

/** WordCloudã®SVGæ–‡å­—åˆ—ä½œæˆç”¨ */
const cloud = require('d3-cloud')

/** createPageã«ã¦WordCloudç”Ÿæˆå‡¦ç†ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹ */
exports.createPages = ({ graphql, { createPage } }) => {

  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {

    /** (ç•¥)ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆå‘¼ã³å‡ºã— */

    graphql(/** (ç•¥)è¨˜äº‹æƒ…å ±å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒª */).then(result => {

      /** (ç•¥)ã‚‚ã‚ã‚‚ã‚ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ä½œæˆ */


      // WordCloudç”¨ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿åŠ å·¥å‡¦ç†

      /** (ç•¥)resultã‹ã‚‰è¨˜äº‹å…¨æ–‡ã®é…åˆ—(allPostHtmlTexts)ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹å‡¦ç† */

      // è¨˜äº‹å…¨æ–‡æ–‡å­—åˆ—å–å¾—
      const allPostTexts = allPostHtmlTexts
        .map(allHtmlTexts => {
          // HTMLæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‹ã‚‰ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’é™¤å¤–
          // ãŸã ã—preã‚¿ã‚°ã¯ã€ä¸­èº«ã‚’WordCloudè§£æå¯¾è±¡å¤–ã¨ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã“ã“ã§ã¯ã‚ãˆã¦æ®‹ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
          const stripedAllText = striptags(allHtmlTexts, '<pre>')

          // ãã®ãŸã‚preã‚¿ã‚°ã¨ãã®ä¸­èº«ã‚’é™¤å¤–ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
          // preã‚¿ã‚°ã®ä¸­è¦‹ã¯ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€‚
          // ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å¤–ã®æ–‡ç« ä¸­ã«è¨˜è¿°ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’æƒ³å®šã—ã¦
          // WordCloudã®å¯¾è±¡ã‹ã‚‰å¤–ã™ã€‚
          return replace(/<pre[\s\S]+?>[\s\S]+?<\/pre>/g, '').trim()
        })
        // æ”¹è¡Œã§ã¤ãªã
        .join('\n')
      

      /** (ç•¥)resultã‹ã‚‰è¨˜äº‹å…¨ã‚¿ã‚°ã®é…åˆ—(allPostTags)ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹å‡¦ç† */

      // è¨˜äº‹ã‚¿ã‚°å–å¾—
      const tagDatas = []

      // è¨˜äº‹å…¨ã‚¿ã‚°æƒ…å ±ã‹ã‚‰ã©ã®ã‚¿ã‚°ãŒä½•å›å‡ºç¾ã™ã‚‹ã‹ç®—å‡º
      allPostTags.forEach(tags => {
        tags.forEach(t => {

          const targetData = tagDatas.find(data => data.text === t)
          if (targetData) {
            targetData.size = targetData.size + 1
          } else {
            tagDatas.push({
              text: t,
              size: 1,
            })
          }
        })
      })


      // ã‚¿ã‚°å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒƒãƒˆã«WordCloudç”Ÿæˆ
      // ã‚¿ã‚°æƒ…å ±ã®å ´åˆå½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã›ãšã¨ã‚‚å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ãŒç®—å‡ºã§ãã‚‹ã®ã§
      // å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã¯ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
      createWordCloud({
        words: tagDatas,
        w: 1200,
        h: 630,

        fontSizeZoom: 18,

      }).then(tagSvg => { // ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒƒãƒˆã«ã—ãŸSVGãŒå‡ºæ¥ä¸ŠãŒã‚‹

        // è¨˜äº‹å…¨æ–‡æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒƒãƒˆã«å˜èªå‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ç®—å‡º
        createWordCount(alltext)
          .then(data => {

            // è¨˜äº‹å…¨æ–‡ã®å˜èªå‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒƒãƒˆã«WordCloudç”Ÿæˆ
            return createWordCloud({
              words: data,
              w: 1200,
              h: 630,
              fontSizePow: 0.6,
              fontSizeZoom: 3.1,
              padding: 0.2,
            })
          })
          .then(textSvg => { // è¨˜äº‹å…¨æ–‡ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒƒãƒˆã«ã—ãŸSVGãŒå‡ºæ¥ä¸ŠãŒã‚‹

            // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆæ™‚ã«SVGã‚’Contextã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã¨ã—ã¦æ¸¡ã™
            createPage({
              path: '/map/',
              component: postRelationMapPage,
              context: {
                allPostRelations,
                wordCloudText : textSvg,
                wordCloudTag: tagSvg,
              },
            })

            // ã™ã¹ã¦ã®createPageã‚’å‘¼ã³çµ‚ã‚ã£ãŸã‚ã¨ã«resolveã‚’å‘¼ã‚“ã§å‡¦ç†çµ‚äº†
            resolve('OK')
          })
      })
    })

  })
}

/**
 * ï¼’ã¤ã®å˜èªã®å¤§æ–‡å­—å°æ–‡å­—ã®é•ã„ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹
 */
function countDiff(a, b) {
  return a
    .split('')
    .map((charA, i) => charA === b[i] ? 0 :1)
    .reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0)
}


/**
 * æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã—ã¦å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’è¿”ã™
 */
function createWordCount(text) {

  // ã‚ˆãå‡ºã‚‹è¨€ã„å›ã—ã§WordCloudã‹ã‚‰é™¤å¤–ã—ãŸã„å˜èªã‚’åˆ—æŒ™  
  const excludeWords = [
    'æŒ‡å®š',
    'æ™‚',
    'è¿½åŠ ',
    /** (ç•¥)é™¤å¤–ã—ãŸã„å˜èª */
  ]


  /** kuromoji.jsã«ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹è¾æ›¸ã®æ ¼ç´å ´æ‰€ */
  const DIC_URL = 'node_modules/kuromoji/dict'

  /** WordCloudã§ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹å“è©ï¼ˆåŠ©è©ãƒ»åŠ©å‹•è©ãªã©ã¯çœãï¼‰ */
  const TARGET_POS = ['åè©']

  /** kuromoji.jsã§è©²å½“ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã®å€¤ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„å ´åˆã«è¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹å€¤ */
  const NO_CONTENT = '*'

  // kuromoji.jsã§å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æ
  // å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {

    kuromoji.builder({ dicPath: DIC_URL }).build((err, tokenizer) => {
      if(err){
        return reject(err)
      }

      // å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›
      const words = tokenizer.tokenize(text)
        .filter(t => TARGET_POS.includes(t.pos))
        .map(t => t.basic_form === NO_CONTENT ? t.surface_form : t.basic_form)
        .reduce((data, text) => {
          // å¤§æ–‡å­—ã¨å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’åŒºåˆ¥ã›ãšå‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹
          const upperText = text.toUpperCase()
          if (excludeWords.includes(upperText)) {
            return data
          }

          const target = data.find(c => c.text === upperText)

          // å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã¯å¤§æ–‡å­—å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’åŒºåˆ¥ã—ãªã„ãŒã€å®Ÿéš›ã®ç”Ÿã®å˜èªã¯å¾Œã®å‡¦ç†ã§ä½¿ã†ãŸã‚ã¨ã£ã¦ãŠã
          if(target) {
            target.size = target.size + 1
            if(!target.rawTexts.includes(text)) {
              target.rawTexts.push(text)
            }
          } else {
            data.push({
              text: upperText,
              rawTexts: [ text ],
              size: 1,
            })
          }
          return data
        }, [])
        .map(data => {

          // ä¸Šè¨˜å‡¦ç†ã§ä¿æŒã—ã¦ãŠã„ãŸç”Ÿã®å˜èªã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«ã€ä¸€ç•ªå¤§æ–‡å­—ãŒå¤šã„å˜èªã‚’WordCloudã®å˜èªã¨ã—ã¦æ¡ç”¨ã™ã‚‹
          // ä¾‹ãˆã°Gatsbyã¨gatsbyã§ã‚ã‚Œã°Gatsbyã‚’æ¡ç”¨
          const almostSameText = data.rawTexts.map(text => {
              return {
                text,
                diff: countDiff(text, data.text),
              }
            })
            .reduce((a, b) => a.diff <= b.diff ? a : b) // å¤§æ–‡å­—ã«è¿‘ã„ã»ã†ã‚’æ¡ç”¨ã™ã‚‹
            .text
          
          return {
            text: almostSameText,
            size: data.size,
          }
        })

      resolve(words)
    })
  })
}

/**
 * å˜èªå‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«WordCloudã®SVGæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’è¿”ã™
 */
function createWordCloud({
  words, // å˜èªå‡ºç¾å›æ•°
  w, // SVGã®å¹…(å˜ä½px)
  h, // SVGã®é«˜ã•(å˜ä½px)
  fontSizePow, // WordCloudã®æ–‡å­—ã®å¤§ãã•ã®æ¯”ç‡èª¿æ•´ç”¨ä¿‚æ•°
  fontSizeZoom, // WordCloudã®æ–‡å­—ã®å¤§ãã•ã®ä¿‚æ•°
  padding, // WordCloudã®æ–‡å­—é–“ã®éš™é–“
}) {

  // D3-Cloudã«ã‚ˆã‚‹è§£æ
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    cloud().size([w, h])
      .canvas(() => createCanvas(w, h))
      .words(words)
      .rotate(word => word.size % 2 === 1 ? 0 : 90) // å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ç¸¦ã‹æ¨ªå‘ãã«è¡¨ç¤º
      .fontWeight(word => Math.pow(word.size, fontSizePow) * fontSizeZoom)
      .fontSize(word => Math.pow(word.size, fontSizePow) * fontSizeZoom)
      .font('meiryo')
      .padding(padding)
      .on('end', wordsForCloud => {

        resolve(wordsForCloud)
      })
      .start()
  })
  // d3.jsã«ã‚ˆã‚‹è§£æ
  .then(wordsForCloud => {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      /** ä»®æƒ³DOM */
      const document = new JSDOM(`<body></body>`).window.document

      d3.select(document.body)
        .append('svg')
          .attr('class', 'ui fluid image')
          .attr('viewBox', `0 0 ${w} ${h}`)
          .attr('width', '100%')
          .attr('height', '100%')
        .append('g')
          .attr('transform', `translate(${w/2},${h/2})`)
        .selectAll('text')
          .data(wordsForCloud)
        .enter().append('text')
          .style('font-size', d => `${d.size}px`)
          .style('font-family', d => d.font)
          .attr('transform', d => `translate(${d.x}, ${d.y})rotate(${d.rotate})`)
          .style('fill', (d, i) => d3.schemeCategory10[i % 10])
          .attr('text-anchor', 'middle')
          .text(d => d.text)
      
      // æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«SVGã®æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’è¿”ã™
      resolve(document.body.innerHTML)
    })
  })
}

ãªãŠå½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã‚„WordCloudç”Ÿæˆã¯é‡ã„å‡¦ç†ãªã®ã§ã€ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«æ™‚é–“ãŒã‹ã‹ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ãŒã€ç”»é¢è¡¨ç¤ºã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã¯ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã«å½±éŸ¿ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
ã‚ã¨æœ¬æ¥ã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³åŒ–ã—ã¦é…å¸ƒã—ãŸã„ã¨ã“ã‚ã§ã™ãŒã€ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³åŒ–ã®ãŸã‚ã«ã¯ã€ã¾ã ã¾ã æ±ç”¨æ€§ã‚’é«˜ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã£ã¦ã€ãã‚Œã¯ä»Šå¾Œã®èª²é¡Œã§ã™ğŸ…

ãªã«ã“ã‚Œ

å‰å›è¨˜äº‹ã§ã¯Reactã§WordCloudã‚’å‡ºåŠ›ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã—ã‹ã—å®Ÿéš›ã¯ã€éå»å¤§é‡ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‹ã‚‰å‡ºåŠ›ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦ä½¿ãˆãŸã»ã†ãŒä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ã€‚ ãã“ã§å‰å›ã®ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚’ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«Node.jsã§WordCloudã®SVGãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›ã™ã‚‹ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ä»Šå›ã¯ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã®å®Ÿè£…æ–¹æ³•ã‚’ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã¨åˆã‚ã›ã¦ã”ç´¹ä»‹ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

const DIC_URL = '/dict'

// WordCloudã®æƒ…å ±ã¨ã—ã¦æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹å“è©ï¼ˆåŠ©è©ã€åŠ©å‹•è©ãªã©ã¯æ„å‘³ãŒãªã„ã®ã§æ‹¾ã‚ãªã„ï¼‰
const TARGET_POS = ['åè©', 'å‹•è©', 'å½¢å®¹è©']

// kuromoji.jsã®è§£æçµæœã®å€¤ã§ç‰¹ã«å€¤ãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ–‡å­—ãŒè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹
const NO_CONTENT = '*'

class App extends React.Component {

  // kuromoji.jsã«ã‚ˆã‚‹å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã¯éåŒæœŸãªã®ã§
  // è§£æçµæœã¯stateã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚³ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ã§åˆæœŸåŒ–ã—ã¦ãŠã
  constructor(props) {

  componentWillMount() {
    // è¾æ›¸ã‚’èª­ã¿æ··ã‚“ã§ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒŠã‚¤ã‚¶ãƒ¼ï¼ˆå½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®é–¢æ•°ï¼‰ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
    kuromoji.builder({ dicPath: DIC_URL }).build((err, tokenizer) => {

      const tokens = tokenizer.tokenize(text)

      // è§£æçµæœã‹ã‚‰å˜èªã¨å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
      const dataForD3Cloud = tokens
        // posï¼ˆå“è©ï¼‰ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã€'åè©', 'å‹•è©', 'å½¢å®¹è©'ã®ã¿ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
        .filter(t => TARGET_POS.includes(t.pos))

        .map(t => t.basic_form === NO_CONTENT ? t.surface_form : t.basic_form)

        .reduce((data, text) => {

      this.setState({dataForD3Cloud})
    })
  }

  render() {
    // ç•¥
  }
}

export default App;

import remark from 'remark'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import mdastToString from 'mdast-util-to-string';
import GithubSlugger from 'github-slugger';
const githubSlugger = new GithubSlugger()

// ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‹ã‚‰ç›®æ¬¡æƒ…å ±ã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹
function _extractToc(rawMarkdownBody) {
  githubSlugger.reset();

  const result = []
  const ast = remark().parse(rawMarkdownBody);
  visit(ast, 'heading', child => {
    const value = child.children[0].value
    const id = githubSlugger.slug(value || mdastToString(child))
    const depth = child.depth
    result.push({
      value,
      id,
      depth
    })
  })

  return result
}

import React from 'react';
import { throttle } from 'lodash';
import Toc from './toc';

const githubSlugger = new GithubSlugger()


class ScrollSyncToc extends React.Component {
  constructor(props, context) {
    super(props, context);

    this.toc = _getToc(this.props.rawMarkdownBody)

    this.state = {
      activeItemIds: [],
      itemTopOffsets: [],
    };

    this.calculateItemTopOffsets = this.calculateItemTopOffsets.bind(this);
    this.handleScroll = throttle(this.handleScroll.bind(this), 100) // è² è·è»½æ¸›ã®ãŸã‚é–“å¼•ã
  }

  componentDidMount() {
    this.calculateItemTopOffsets();
    window.addEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);
  }

  componentWillUnmount() {
    window.removeEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);
  }

  calculateItemTopOffsets() {
    this.setState({
      itemTopOffsets: _getElementTopOffsetsById(this.toc),
    });
  }

  handleScroll() {
    const { itemTopOffsets } = this.state;

    const item = itemTopOffsets.find((current, i) => {
      const next = itemTopOffsets[i + 1]

      // è‡ªç« ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
      // ã‹ã¤ æ¬¡ç« ã¾ã§ã¯ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ å ´åˆã¯
      // è‡ªç« ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã¿ãªã™
      return next
        ? window.scrollY >= current.offsetTop &&
            window.scrollY < next.offsetTop
        : window.scrollY >= current.offsetTop;
    })

    // Qiitaã£ã½ãè‡ªç« ã¨ã‚ã‚ã›ã¦è¦ªç« ã‚’ãƒã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã•ã›ãŸã„ã®ã§
    // itemTopOffsetsã§ã¯è¦ªç« ã®å‚ç…§ã‚‚æŒãŸã›ã¦ãŠã
    // ã“ã“ã§activeItemIdsã«æ ¼ç´ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    const activeItemIds =
      item
        ? item.parents
          ? [item.id, ...item.parents.map(i => i.id)]
          : [item.id]
        : [];

    // setStateã‚’ä»‹ã—ã¦stateã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§
    // è¡¨ç¤ºä¸­ã®ç« ã«å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«ã®ã¿å†æç”»ãŒèµ°ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
    this.setState({activeItemIds});
  }

  render() {
    const { activeItemIds } = this.state;
    return <Toc activeItemIds={activeItemIds} toc={this.toc} {...this.props} />;
  }
}

import React from 'react'
import { HashLink as Link } from 'react-router-hash-link';

class Toc extends React.Component {
  render() {
    const { toc, activeItemIds } = this.props;
    const items = toc.map(item => {
      return (
        <li style={{
          textAlign: 'left',
          marginLeft: `${(item.depth - 2) * 24}px`,
          listStyle: 'none'
          }}>
          <Link
            key={item.id}
            to={`#${item.id}`}
            className={activeItemIds.includes(item.id) ? 'active' : ''}>{item.value}</Link>
        </li>
      )
    })

    return (
      <ul style={{padding: '12px', background: '#eee'}}>
        {items}
      </ul>
    );
  }
}

export default Toc;

HTMLã‹ã‚‰ç›®æ¬¡æƒ…å ±æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹å‡¦ç†
import rehype from 'rehype'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import hastToString from 'hast-util-to-string'

const MIN_HEADER_DEPTH = 1
const HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST = 'element'
const HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST = ['h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6']

function _extractHeadingDetails(htmlStr) {
  // HASTå½¢å¼ã®æŠ½è±¡æ§‹æ–‡æœ¨ã«å¤‰æ›
  const htmlAst = rehype.parse(htmlStr)

  // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°(h1ã€œh6ã‚¿ã‚°)ã‚’æ¢ã™
  const result = []
  visit(htmlAst, HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST, node => {
    if (!HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST.includes(node.tagName)) {
      return
    }

    // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°ã‹ã‚‰æ·±ã•ã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    const heading = {
      depth: Number(node.tagName[1]),
      value: hastToString(node).replace('\n', '')
    }
    // aã‚¿ã‚°ã®ã†ã¡hrefå±æ€§ãŒ#å§‹ã¾ã‚Šã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’æ¢ã—idã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    node.children.filter(c => _isHeaderIdLink(c)).forEach(c => {
      heading.id = decodeURI(c.properties.href.split('#')[1])
    });

    result.push(heading)
  })

  return result
}

function _isHeaderIdLink(node) {
  return node.tagName === 'a'
          && node.properties.href
          && node.properties.href.startsWith('#')
}

exports.onCreateNode = ({ node, actions, getNode }) => {
  const { createNodeField } = actions

  if (node.internal.type !== `MarkdownRemark` && node.internal.type !== `QiitaPost`) {
    return
  }

  // ã“ã“ã§å·®ç•°ã‚’å¸å
  const [
    slug,
    title,
    date,
    excerpt,
    tags,
  ] =
    node.internal.type === `MarkdownRemark`
      ? [
        createFilePath({ node, getNode }),
        node.frontmatter.title,
        node.frontmatter.date,
        _excerptMarkdown(node.rawMarkdownBody, 120),
        node.frontmatter.tags
      ]
      :[
        `/${node.id}/`,
        node.title,
        node.created_at,
        _excerptHtml(node.rendered_body, 120),
        [...(node.tags.map(tag => tag.name) || []), 'Qiita'] // Qiitaã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
      ]

  // ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®fieldsã«ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
  createNodeField({ name: `slug`,     node,   value: slug     })
  createNodeField({ name: `title`,    node,   value: title    })
  createNodeField({ name: `date`,     node,   value: date     })
  createNodeField({ name: `excerpt`,  node,   value: excerpt  })
  createNodeField({ name: `tags`,     node,   value: tags     })
}
